text: Kapodistria Square or Markatou Square is a square in Patras, Greece in Markato district. The square dates to the years of post-revolutionary Greece, when the new Patras was designed by Stamatis Voulgaris under orders by Ioannis Kapodistrias.Βόλτα στο Μαρκάτο A bust of Kapodistrias is located in the square. ==References== Category:Streets and squares in Patras Category:Ioannis Kapodistrias
title: Kapodistria Square
